page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: The western edge of Tilehurst is growing rapidly,covering agricultural land and open spaces. A mixed type of housing in high density is now being built. Semi_detatched,Detatched,Maisonettes, Bungalows and Town Houses,(terraces) are the kind that are being put up now.The houses are being built of traditional brick and tile.But in certain parts a new style of construction is developing.A timber frame in a wall with plaster board backing insulated with 9cm of thick fiber,backed by 8mm of plywood.This is covered with a special breather paper. Outside this insulated "sandwich" is built the conventional brick outer face leaving a normal cavity. The roof,(well insulated,)is again of tile.This creates an energy factor of 0.3(u value)which is an improvement.
